name: Cozy Cabin (itch)
description:
Description:

It's cold outside so why not have a cozy night in a log cabin? But you'll need a few extra things to make it a truly cosy evening. 

Head out into the cold to find all three items and then head to the cabin for the perfect night in, but make sure you don't get too cold. Find Fire Sprites roaming the woods to keep you heat level high.

How to play:

W, A, S, D keys for player movement.

Keep warm by standing near fire sprites.

Find and collect all three items.

Head back to your cabin after collecting each item.

Made by:

Cody Bowyer

DavBlahBlah

Travis England-Hewlett

Sourced Audio:
